juzs.text: 78|1|Nanigoto ni tsuite, kare-ra wa tazune au no ka.
78|2|Idaina shōsoku ni tsui te.
78|3|Sore ni tsuite, kare-ra wa iken ga kotonaru.
78|4|Iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirou.
78|5|Iya, iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirudearou.
78|6|Ware wa daichi o, hirobiro to shinakatta ka.
78|7|Mata yamayama o, kui to shitate wanai ka.
78|8|Ware wa anata gata o ryōsei ni tsukuri,
78|9|mata kyūsoku no tame, anata gata no suimin o sadame,
78|10|yoru o ōi to shi,
78|11|hiru o seikei no shudan to shite sadameta.
78|12|Mata ware wa, anata gata no ue ni kengo ni 7-sō (no ten) o uchi-date,
78|13|teru ya kashī tomoshi hi o (sono naka ni) oki,
78|14|ware wa kumo kara yutaka ni ame o furase,
78|15|sore ni yotte, kara-mono ya yasai o moe dasa se,
78|16|samazamana en o shigera seru.
78|17|Hontōni sabaki no hi wa sadame rarete ite,
78|18|sonohi, rappa ga fuka reruto anata gata wa gun o nashite detekuru.
78|19|Ten wa aka rete kazukazu no mon to nari,
78|20|yamayama wa utsusa rete shinkirō no yō ni naru.
78|21|Hontōni jigoku wa, machibuse no badeari,
78|22|haishin-sha no ochitsuku tokoro,
78|23|kare-ra wa itsumademo sono naka ni sumudearou.
78|24|Sokode suzushi-sa mo ajiwaezu,(don'na) nomimono mo nai,
78|25|nietagiru yu to nō no soto ni wa.
78|26|(Kare-ra no tame) fusawashī hōshōdearu.
78|27|Hontōni kare-ra wa,(sono okonai ni taisuru) seisan o kibō shinaide ita.
78|28|Mata kare-ra wa waga shirushi o usodearu to itte, tsuyoku kyohi shita.
78|29|Ware wa issai no koto o, ten no sho ni tomete iru.
78|30|Dakara anata gata wa (jibun no okonai no kekka o) ajiwae. Ware wa chōbatsu o zōka suru bakaridearu.
78|31|Hontōni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru.
78|32|Midori no en ya, budō-en,
78|33|mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi,
78|34|mata naminamito afureru hai.
78|35|Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai.
78|36|Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hōshō, tamamono no kessandearu.
78|37|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai.
78|38|Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashī koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai.
78|39|Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga ī.

78|40|Hontōni ware wa, chōbatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryōhō no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyō) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`ā , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou.
79|1|Araarashiku (tsumibukaimono no tamashī o) hikihanasu mono ni oite (chikau),
79|2|yasashiku (shinkōbukai-sha no tamashī o) hikidasu mono ni oite,
79|3|oyogu yō ni (jihi no tsukai ni) kassō suru mono ni oite,
79|4|sakiwoarasotte zenshin suru mono ni oite,
79|5|(-nushi no meirei de) koto o shori suru mono ni oite (chikau).
79|6|Sonohi (dai ichi no rappa de), shindō ga (subete no mono o) yurugashi,
79|7|-ji no rappa (de shindō) ga, tsudzuku.
79|8|(Fushin-sha no) kokoro wa, sonohi ononoki furue,
79|9|-me o fuserudearou.
79|10|Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa hajime (seizen) no jōtai ni, hontōni kaeru nodeshou ka.
79|11|Nani to, watashi-tachi wa kuchihateta hone ni natte shimatta no ni.'
79|12|Kare-ra wa iu. `So no baai (fukkatsu), son'na modoridesu.'
79|13|(Fukkatsu wa), tada hitokoe no sakebidearu.
79|14|Miyo, kare-ra wa mezamete (chijō ni) arawareru.
79|15|Mūsā no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka.
79|16|Omo ga towā no hijiridani ni, kare o yoba reta toki o omoiokose.
79|17|(Kare wa ōse rareta. ) `Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontōni kare wa me ni amaru monodearu.
79|18|Soshite kare ni itte yaru ga ī. “Anata wa (tsumi kara) kiyome raretai no ka.
79|19|Watashi wa anata o,-nushi no omoto ni michibiku. Anata wa (kare o) osore nasai.”'
79|20|(Mūsā wa) saidai no shirushi o kare ni shimeshita.
79|21|Daga kare (firuaun) wa sore o usodearu to shi,(michibiki ni) shitagawanakatta.
79|22|Se o mukete isoide satta.
79|23|Kare (firuaun) wa,(sono min o) atsume sengen shite,
79|24|itta. `Watashi wa anata gata no shu, shikō-shadearu.'
79|25|Sokode arrā wa kare o 懲 Shime, raise to gense no seikatsu ni chōbatsu o kuwae rareta.
79|26|Hontōni kono nakaniha (omo o) osoreru mono e no hitotsu no kyōkun ga aru.
79|27|Anata gata wa (kare ga) uchi tate rareta ten (no sōzō) ga, anata gata o tsukuru koto yori muzukashī to demo omou no ka.
79|28|Kare wa sore o takaku kakage, sorekara totonoe,
79|29|yoru o kuraku nasa re, mata, kōmyō o gen wa sa reru.
79|30|Sonogo, daichi o nobe hiroge rareta.
79|31|Soko kara mizu to bokujō o araware sase,
79|32|mata yamayama o sore ni shikkari to sue rare,
79|33|anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no, yōeki ni kyō sa reru.
79|34|Sore de ōkī saiyaku ga kuru to,
79|35|sonohi, hitobito wa (gense de) sono doryoku shita koto o omoidashi,
79|36|mata goku hi wa, dare demo miru (hodo no)-sha ni (ariari to) gen wa sa reru.
79|37|Sonotoki, hidoku me ni amatta mono,
79|38|mata konoyo no seikatsu o omonjite ita mono wa,
79|39|hontōni hi goku ga sono sumaidearou.
79|40|Daga omo no gozen ni tatsu koto o osoreta mono, mata teiretsuna yokubō ni taishi (jibun no) tamashī o yokusei shita mono wa,
79|41|hontōni rakuen ga sono sumaidearou.
79|42|Kare-ra wa sonotoki ni tsuite, anata ni tou. `Sore ga tōrai suru no wa, nanji (no hi)desu ka.'
79|43|Anata wa, nani ni yotte sore o tsuge rareyou ka.
79|44|Sono shūmatsu (no chishiki) wa, anata no omo ni aru dake.
79|45|Anata wa, sore o osoreru mono e no, hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai.
79|46|Kare-ra ga sore o miru hi,(haka no naka ni) tairyū shite ita no wa, ichi yū ka ichi asa ni suginakatta yō ni omoudearou.
80|1|(Muhanmado wa) mayu o hisome,-gao o somuketa.
80|2|Hitori no mōjin ga yatteki (te hanashi ga chūdan sa re)ta tamedearu.
80|3|Anata ni dōshite wakarou ka, kare wa kiyome rareru kamo shirenai koto ga.
80|4|Matawa kunkai o ukeirete, sono oshie hakare o ekisuru kamo shirenai koto ga.
80|5|Daga nani no tasuke mo iranai mono (zaisan-ka) ni wa,
80|6|(kanshin o motte) 応待 Suru.
80|7|Shikamo kare ga mizukara kiyomenakute mo, anata ni sekinin wanai.
80|8|Daga nesshin ni (shinkō o) motomete anata no moto ni kita mono de,
80|9|ikei no nen o daite iru mono ni wa,
80|10|anata wa keishi shita.
80|11|Danjite sōdearubekide wanai. Hontōni kore (kuruān) wa kunkaidearu.
80|12|Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kunkai o nenji sase nasai.
80|13|Soreha (arrā no omoto ni aru) chōbo ni shirusa rete iru mono.
80|14|Shikō ni shite seijun'na mono.
80|15|Shoki-tachi (tenshi) no te de (kiroku sa reta mono).
80|16|Kedakaku keiken'na (shoki-tachi).
80|17|Ningen (fushinjin-sha) ni wazawai are. Nanto kare wa bōon'na koto yo.
80|18|Kare wa don'na mono kara, kare o tsukura reru no ka.
80|19|Itteki no seieki karadearu. Kare wa, kare o tsukuri, sorekara gotai o totonoe rare,
80|20|(haha no tainai kara no) kare no michi o yōi ni nasa re,
80|21|yagate kare o shina sete hakaba ni ume,
80|22|sorekara o nozomi no toki ni, kare o yomigaera seru.
80|23|Iya, kare ga meiji rareta koto o,(fu shinkō-sha wa) hatasanakatta.
80|24|Kare ni, jibun no shokumotsu ni tsuite kangae sasete miruga yoi.
80|25|Hontōni ware wa, mizu (ame) o yutaka ni sosogi,
80|26|tsuide daichi o saite kiregire ni shi,
80|27|soko ni seichō sa seru mono ni wa, kokumotsu,
80|28|mata budō ya aokusa,
80|29|orību ya natsumeyashi,
80|30|hanmo shita teien,
80|31|kudamono ya bokusō (ga aru).
80|32|Anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no yōekidearu.
80|33|Yagate,(shūmatsu no) hitokoe ga takanari,
80|34|hito ga jibun no kyōdai kara nogareru hi,
80|35|jibun no haha ya chichi ya,
80|36|mata jibun no tsuma ya shijo kara (nogareru hi).
80|37|Sonohi dare mo kare mo jibun no koto de teippai.
80|38|(Aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kagayaki,
80|39|warai, katsu yorokobu.
80|40|Daga (aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi 挨 Ni nure,
80|41|ankoku ga kao o ōu.
80|42|Korera no mono koso, fushinjin'na-sha, hōtōshadearu.
81|1|Taiyō ga tsutsumikakusa reru toki,
81|2|Moroboshi ga ochiru toki,
81|3|yamayama ga chiru toki,
81|4|harande 10-kagetsu no mesu rakuda ga tōkan ni sa reru toki,
81|5|samazamana yajū ga (kyōfu no amari)-gun o nashi atsumaru toki,
81|6|Taiyō ga waki-tachi, afureru toki,
81|7|sorezore no tamashī ga (nikutai to) kumiawasa reru toki,
81|8|ikiume rarete ita (joji ga)
81|9|don'na tsumi de korosa reta ka to towa reru toki,
81|10|(ten no) chōbo ga, aka reru toki,
81|11|ten ga hagi tora reru toki,
81|12|goku hi ga honō o age sase rareru toki,
81|13|rakuen ga chikadzuku toki,
81|14|(sonotoki) subete no tamashī wa,-saki ni itta (zen'aku) no shogyō o shirudearou.
81|15|Watashi wa shizumi yuku Moroboshi ni oite chikau.
81|16|(Kidō o) unkō shite bossuru (Moroboshi ni oite)
81|17|kurayami o mukaeru yoru ni oite,
81|18|yoake o mukaeru asa ni oite (chikau).
81|19|Hontōni kore (kuruān) wa, kōkina shito (jiburīru) no (arrā kara no) kotoba
81|20|(kare wa) gyokuza no omo no gozen de (songen sa reru chii no) za ni tsuku,-ryoku no aru,
81|21|shitagawa re, shinrai sa reru (shitodearu).
81|22|(Hitobito yo) anata-kata no nakama (muhanmado) wa, kichigaide wanai.
81|23|Kare wa, akarui chiheisen-jō ni hakkiri to kare (jiburīru) o mita.
81|24|Kare wa yūgen-kai (no shitte iru koto) o dashi ka shimanai.
81|25|Sore (kuruān) wa, norowareta akuma no kotoba demonai.
81|26|Sorenanoni anata gata wa (sorera no koto o shin'yō sezu) doko e iku no ka.
81|27|Kore (kuruān) koso wa, ban'nin e no kyōkun nihokanaranai.
81|28|Sore wa anata gata no naka, dare demo tadashī michi o ayumitai to nozomu mono no tame no monodearu.
81|29|Daga ban'yū no shu, arrā no o nozomi ga nai kagiri, anata gata wa kore o nozomu koto mo dekinai nodearu.
82|1|Ten ga, mijin ni sakeru toki,
82|2|Moroboshi ga chirasa reru toki,
82|3|sho Taiyō ga afure dasa reru toki,
82|4|hakaba ga abaka reru toki,
82|5|sorezore no tamashī wa, sudeni shita koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto o shiru.
82|6|Ningen yo, nani ga anata o megumi bukai nushi kara madowa se (somuka se)ta no ka.
82|7|Kare wa anata o sōzō shi, katachi o atae,(kinsei no toreta karada ni) totonoe,
82|8|kare no okokoro no mama ni, keitai o anata ni atae rareta okatadearu.
82|9|Iya, anata gata wa shinpan o usodearu to iu.
82|10|Hontōni anata gata no ue ni wa 2-ri no kanshu (tenshi) ga iru ga,
82|11|kare-ra wa kedakai kiroku-sha de,
82|12|anata gata no shogyō o shitte iru.
82|13|Keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni iru.
82|14|Tsumi aru mono wa, kitto hi no naka ni ite,
82|15|shinpan no hi, kare-ra wa soko de yaka re,
82|16|soko kara, nogare rarenai.
82|17|Shinpan no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
82|18|Ittai shinpan no hi ga nande aru no ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
82|19|Sonohi, dono tamashī mo soto no tamashī no tame ni (yakudatsu) nani no ka mo motanai. Meirei wa, sonohi arrā no mono.
83|1|Wazawai naru ka na,-ryō o herasu mono koso wa.
83|2|Kare-ra wa hito kara hakatte uketoru toki wa, jūbun ni tori,
83|3|(aite ni watasu) ryō ya omo-sa o hakaru toki wa, sukunaku keiryō suru mono-tachidearu.
83|4|Korera no mono wa, yomigaeru koto o kangaenai no ka,
83|5|idainaru hi ni.
83|6|Sonohi,(subete no) ningen wa, ban'yū no omo no gozen ni tatsu node wanai ka.
83|7|Danjite ikenai. Batsu aru mono no kiroku wa, su~ijjīn no naka ni (hokan shite) aru.
83|8|Su~ijjīn ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
83|9|(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga aru).
83|10|Wazawai naru ka na, sonohi, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi yo,
83|11|shinpan no hi o, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi koso wa.
83|12|Kore o usodearu to itte kita mono wa, hangyaku-sha, tsumibito nihokanaranai.
83|13|Waga shirushi ga, kare-ra ni dokuju sa reta toki, kare-ra wa,`mukashi no monogatarida.' To itta.
83|14|Danjite sōde wanai. Omou ni kare-ra no itta (aku) koto ga, sono kokoro no sabi to natta nodearu.
83|15|Iya, hontōni kare-ra wa, sonohi,-nushi (no o hikari) kara shimedasa reru.
83|16|Tsugini kare-ra wa, jigoku de kitto yaka reyou.
83|17|Sokode, kare-ra ni,`kore ga, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita kotodearu.' To tsuge rarerudearou.
83|18|Kore ni hikikae keiken'na-sha no kiroku wa, irri~tsuīn no naka ni (hokan shite) aru.
83|19|Irri~tsuīn ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
83|20|(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga ari),
83|21|(-nushi no) sokkinsha-tachi ga, sore o risshō suru.
83|22|Hontōni keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni ori,
83|23|kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou.
83|24|Anata wa kare-ra no kao ni shifuku no kagayaki o mitomeyou.
83|25|Kare-ra wa, fūin sa reta junryōna sake o sosoga reru.
83|26|Sono fūin wa jakōdearu. Kore o motome netsubō suru mono ni netsubō sa se nasai.
83|27|Soreni wa tasunīmu ga maze rareyou.
83|28|(Arrā ni) chikai-sha-tachi (zenkōsha) wa, sono izumi kara nomou.
83|29|Hontōni tsumi aru-sha-tachi wa, shinkō suru mono o azawaratte ita.
83|30|Soshite kare-ra (shinja) no hata o sugiru to, tagaini (chōshō shite)-me kuba seshi,
83|31|kazoku no moto e kaeru toki, waraigusa ni shita monodearu.
83|32|Kare-ra wa kare-ra (shinja) o mikakeru to,`hontōni korera no mono wa mayotte imasu.' To iu.
83|33|Daga kare-ra wa, kare-ra (shinja) no kanshi-sha to shite tsukawasa reta monode wanai.
83|34|Daga kono Ni~Tsu wa, shinkō suru mono ga fushin-sha-tachi o warai,
83|35|kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou.
83|36|Fushin-sha-tachi wa, sono okonai no mukui o uketadearou ka to.
84|1|Ten ga sake warete,
84|2|sono shu (no inochi) o kiki, shitagau toki,
84|3|daichi ga nobe hiroge rare,
84|4|sono Chū no mono o hakidashite sora ni nari,
84|5|sono shu (no o meirei) o kiki, shitagau toki.
84|6|Ō ningen yo, hontōni anata wa,-nushi no omoto e to rōku shite doryoku suru mono. Kare ni au koto ni naru nodearu.
84|7|Sonotoki migite ni sono shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|8|kare no keisan wa sugu yōi ni seisan sa re,
84|9|kare-ra wa yorokonde, jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaerudearou.
84|10|Daga haigo ni shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|11|jikani shi o motomete sakebu nodaga,
84|12|moeru honō de yaka reyou.
84|13|Hontōni kare wa, jibun no hitobito no naka de kanraku shite ita.
84|14|Kare wa, hontōni (omo no moto ni) kaeru koto nado naidearou to omotte ita.
84|15|Iya,-nushi wa itsumo kare o mitōshite ora reru.
84|16|Watashi wa, rakujitsu no yūbae ni yotte chikau.
84|17|Yoru to, soreni kaeri tsudou mono ni oite,
84|18|mata michitaru tsuki ni kakete (chikau).
84|19|Anata gata wa, kanarazu issō kara hoka-sō ni noborudearou.
84|20|Soredemo, kare-ra ga shinjinai no wa dō shita wake ka.
84|21|Kuruān ga, kare-ra ni Satoru 唱 Sa reru to, kare-ra wa sajida shiyou to wa shinai. 〔Sajida〕
84|22|iya, shinjinai mono wa,(sore o) usodearu to iu.
84|23|Daga arrā wa, kare-ra no mune ni kakusu koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
84|24|Sorede anata wa, tsūretsuna chōbatsu o kare-ra ni tsutae nasai.
84|25|Daga shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni wa taeru koto no nai hōshō ga arou.
85|1|Sho seiza no aru ten ni oite,
85|2|yakusoku sa reta (shinpan no)-bi ni oite,
85|3|risshō suru mono to, risshō sa reru mono to ni oite (chikau).
85|4|Ana no jūnin wa horobosa re,
85|5|hi ni wa maki ga tsugi tasa reru.
85|6|Miyo. Kare-ra wa sono hata ni suwari,
85|7|shinja ni taishite kare-ra ga okonatta koto (no subete) ni tsuite, risshō sa reru.
85|8|Kare-ra ga kare-ra (shinja) o hakugai shita no wa, iryoku aru okata, sanbi sa rerubeki okata arrā o, kare-ra (shinja) ga shinkō shita tame nihokanaranai.
85|9|Kare ni, ten to ji no taiken wa zokusuru. Arrā wa subete no koto no risshō-sha de ara reru.
85|10|Hontōni shinkō suru otome o hakugai shite, sorekara kaigo shinakatta mono ni wa jigoku no chōbatsu ga ari, mata kare-ra ni wa homurabi no chōbatsu ga arou.
85|11|Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshinda mono ni wa, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ga arou. Kore wa idaina kōfuku no jōjudearu.
85|12|Hontōni anata no omo no torae-kata (chōbatsu) wa kyōretsudearu.
85|13|Kare koso wa sōzō o nasa re, mata sore o kurikaesa reru okatadearu.
85|14|Kare wa, kan'yō ni shite hakuai narabinai okata.
85|15|Eikō ni michita, shikō no gyokuza no omo.
85|16|Kare wa o nozomi no koto o, suikō nasa reru.
85|17|Gunzei no monogatari ga, anata ni tasshita ka,
85|18|firuaun to samūdo (no min no).
85|19|Iya, shinjinai mono wa (nao shinri o) usodearu to shite iru.
85|20|Daga arrā wa, haigo kara kare-ra o tori kakoma reru.
85|21|Iya kore wa, eikō ni michita kuruān de,
85|22|shugo sa reta ishibumi-ban ni (meiki sa rete iru).
86|1|Ten to, yoruotozurerumono ni yotte (chikau).
86|2|Yoru otozureru mono ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
86|3|(Soreha) kirameki kagayaku hoshi.
86|4|Dare mo jibun no ue ni gādian (tenshi) o motanai mono wanai.
86|5|Ningen wa, nani kara tsukura reta ka o kōsatsu sa se nasai.
86|6|Kare wa funshutsu suru mizu kara tsukura re,
86|7|(soreha) rokkotsu to koshi no ma kara detekuru.
86|8|Hontōni kare wa, kare o (aratana seimei ni) hikimodosu koto ga kanōdearu.
86|9|Kakusa reta koto ga bakuro sa reru hi,
86|10|(ningen ni wa) chikara mo naku, dare no tasuke mo nai.
86|11|(Kaiten shite) kaeru ten ni yotte,
86|12|sake wareru daichi ni yotte (chikau).

110|3|anata no omo no eikō o home tatae, mata o yurushi o koe. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okatadearu.
111|1|Abū rahabu no ryōte wa horobi, kare mo horobite shimae.
111|2|Kare no tomi mo mōketa kin mo, kare no tame ni yakudachi wa shinai.
111|3|Yagate kare wa, moesakaru honō no gōka no naka de yaka reyou.
111|4|Kare no tsuma wa sono maki o hakobu,
111|5|kubi ni shuro no aranawa kakete.
112|1|Ie,`kare wa arrā, yuiitsunaru okata de ara reru.
112|2|Arrā wa, jison sa re,
112|3|o umi nasaranaishi, osanre ni nara reta node wanai,
112|4|kare ni kurabe eru, nanimono mo nai.'
113|1|Ie,`reimei no omo ni go kago o koinegau.
113|2|Kare ga tsukura reru mono no waru (sainan) kara,
113|3|fukamaru yoru no yami no waru (kigai) kara,
113|4|musubime ni iki o fukikakeru (yōjutsu tsukai no) on'na-tachi no aku kara,
113|5|mata, shitto suru mono no shitto no waru (saiyaku) kara.'
114|1|Ie,`go kago o koinegau, ningen no shu,
114|2|ningen no ō,
114|3|ningen'nokami ni.
114|4|Kossori to shinobikomi, sasayaku mono no aku kara.
114|5|Sore ga ningen no mune ni sasayaki kakeru,
114|6|Jin (kasoke Tadashi)dearou to, ningendearou to.'
